items.sentence: I\'d recommend that you try to take it easy.
I wonder whether or not Tom is a vegetarian.
I wonder whether or not Tom is disappointed.
I wonder whether or not Tom is really happy.
I wonder whether or not Tom is still hungry.
Why don\'t you take the rest of the day off?
Where did Tom learn to speak French so well?
I think we\'re going to need more umbrellas.
Tom told me that I should consider retiring.
Tom wanted Mary to meet some of his friends.
You\'ll never love me as much as I love you.
I\'ve been busy getting ready for the party.
I promise I won\'t tell anyone where Tom is.
You could\'ve stayed quiet, but you didn\'t.
Tom hasn\'t said anything since he got home.
Tom hasn\'t yet been asked to do that again.
I didn\'t know you were that good at French.
I don\'t have much money in my bank account.
I don\'t know how much longer I can do this.
Tom is a trombone player in the school band.
